definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
gear/brake/sluice/lock (on waterway)/electric switch or circuit breaker

sentences.english: Remember, if gas is turned off, a  professional must restore service.
sentences.chinese: 在燃氣閘關閉後，必須由專業人員重新打開。

sentences.english: Both airlock doors should not be opened simultaneously.
sentences.chinese: 氣閘室的兩個門不可以同時打開。
